Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing for an electronic signature for persons who contest a parking ticket online.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing for an electronic signature for persons who contest a parking ticket online.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating one day temporary parking permits.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating one day temporary parking permits.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring photographs to be included with certain notices of violation for parking violations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring traffic agents to photograph all ticketable offenses and include a copy of the photograph with each notice of violation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to parking violations issued for the failure to display a muni-meter receipt.

Items.MatterName: Parking violations issued for the failure to display a muni-meter receipt.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring parking placards to have a barcode which would allow traffic enforcement agents to confirm their validity.
